name: The Return of the Legendary Archmage
author: Junsol
content: Shin Ha-ryul is the prodigy of modern magical technology and artificial intelligence. However, he&#039s been deemed an outcast for unable to be implanted.A book appears before him, the magician who has been sentenced to death.&quotTo the posterity who can hear this voice and has the same constitution as me, I, Rai Bell Vaitener, leave this book.&quotAlong with the book left behind by the legendary great mage, the frozen time of the genius begins to move again.
